channel.title: RogEE Show Me My Assets! changelog
channel.description: Changes and updates to Michael Rog's "Show Me My Assets!" EE2 extension: http://rog.ee/show_me_my_assets

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
• First draft...
  • Points the "File Manager" CP nav item to Assets browser, if it is installed.
  • Supports NSM Addon Updater.
  • Please email me if you come across any bugs or behavioral inconsistencies!

Thanks to Adam Fairholm for starting the discussion about the undocumented but extremely useful cp_menu_array extension hook that makes this extension possible!

item.title: Version 1.1.0
item.description:
• Added "expand subfolders" functionality
  • Added basic settings
  • Introduced proper last_call checks

item.title: Version 1.1.1
item.description:
• Fixed "expand subfolders" functionality to work consistently in File Manager and in-field file browser
  • Version bump
